data.taskTitle: Epic: Custom Question Signal System (jat-signal question)
summary: All 6 child tasks completed: schema, validation, hook, API, UI, automation
jat-signal question command emits structured JSON with question/options
PostToolUse hook captures signals and writes to /tmp/jat-question-*.json files
Dashboard API endpoint /api/sessions/[name]/custom-question serves question data
SessionCard renders clickable buttons for choice/confirm/input question types
Automation rules can use show_question_ui action type to display custom questions
Full documentation in shared/signals.md and dashboard/CLAUDE.md
reviewFocus: Verify dashboard correctly renders custom question UI when signal is emitted
Test all three question types: choice, confirm, input
Check automation integration with show_question_ui action

summary: Fixed EventStack to render clickable buttons for question signals
Buttons now send answers via tmux sendInput
